name: Sonic In Spring Valley
description:
Sonic In Spring Valley

The Sequel To Fang In Emerald Valley

Date: April 15th 2020

Control

Arrow Keys To Move

Spacebar To Jump

Story/Plot

After The Event Of Fang In Emerald Valley, Fang And His Crew Destroy Metal Sonic From Destroying The World. Dr. Robotnik Hired Both Rocket Metal Sonic And Metal Knuckles To Take Over His Job To Stop Sonic And Dash. Fang  And Bean Had To Be Separate From Sonic And Dash. They Leave Them And Go On A Treasure Hunt On A Island Called Spring Island Now That Sonic And Dash Was Going To An  Adventure Without Fang And Bean Until They Find Knuckles And Espio Was Sitting Down.  Sonic Asked Them To Joined Him And Dash On An Adventure To Find Out About Secret Iteem On Their Adventure And They Joined Sonic And Dash. Now That There Are Four Good Guys Working Together! It Up To Sonic, Dash, Knuckles And Espio To Work Together.
